```
cd ~/komodo/src/cc
./makecustom
cd ..
make
../zcutil/build.sh -j$(nproc)
```

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: cleanwallettransactions only works if all the transactions before some height are spent... if there is one single utxo that is very old it will not clean the other transactions... to force it to work, you need to send everything to yourself first
